zh.title: 巴布亚新几内亚宣布独立
美国海军拦截阿基莱·劳伦号劫持者
欧洲委员会通过《阿姆斯特丹条约》
德国总理施罗德提前举行大选失利
加勒比海霍乱爆发，海地疫情严重
诺贝尔经济学奖授予克劳迪娅·戈尔丁

en.title: Papua New Guinea became independent from Australia.
U.S. Navy intercepts Egyptian plane carrying Achille Lauro hijackers.
The first episode of *Batman: The Animated Series* aired.
Scientists announce discovery of the world's oldest human ancestor.
Angela Merkel sworn in as Germany's first female Chancellor.
Antilles dissolved, Curaçao and Sint Maarten become autonomous.
A magnitude 6.9 earthquake struck near Vanuatu.
Malala Yousafzai awarded Nobel Peace Prize.
Hurricane Michael makes landfall in Florida as a Category 4 storm.
